The Cranston Fire is burning in the Mountain Center area, with evacuations still taking place. Firefighters are holding off on any firing operations in the area until evacuations are completed. The fire has now burned 7,500 acres and is 5% contained. 6

Traffic diversions are temporary closures of roads or lanes to allow for construction or other work. They are implemented to ensure the safety of workers and motorists, and to minimize traffic congestion. Diversions can be signaled by the use of traffic lights, signs, or cones.
